name: List Notifications
description: Retrieve notifications for a user from global and/or space-scoped stores, optionally filtering by status.

user_id.description: Target user identifier whose notifications should be listed.

scope.description: Which stores to include (global, space, or all). Defaults to all.

space_id.description: Optional space identifier when listing space-specific notifications outside the current space.

status.description: Filter by notification status (unread, read, or all). Defaults to unread only when specified.

limit.description: Maximum number of notifications to return (most recent first).

include_meta.description: When true, returns additional summary metadata (unread counts, scopes).
